title: tiup playground fails with a tikv error during execution in the Gitpod environment
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

tiup playground fails with a tikv error during execution in the Gitpod environment.

([This official document](https://docs.pingcap.com/zh/tidb/stable/dev-guide-playground-gitpod) guides users to test tidb using the gitpod environment)


### What version of TiKV are you using?
```
~/.tiup/components/tikv/v6.3.0/tikv-server --version
TiKV 
Release Version:   6.3.0
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   f9ae84f772c522dea7d57dceedba801db3a2103c
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v6.3.0
UTC Build Time:    2022-09-27 10:37:15
Rust Version:      rustc 1.64.0-nightly (0f4bcadb4 2022-07-30)
Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure
Profile:           dist_release
```

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->
```
gitpod /workspace/tidb-example-java (main) $ cat /proc/cpuinfo
processor       : 0
vendor_id       : AuthenticAMD
cpu family      : 25
model           : 1
model name      : AMD EPYC 7B13
stepping        : 0

cache size      : 512 KB
```
